results.title: Novel Targets of Metformin in Cardioprotection: Beyond the Effects Mediated by AMPK.
results.text_hl: Further advances related to the biological effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and cardioprotective approaches may provide new therapies to protect the heart and prevent @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@cardiac remodeling@@@ and @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@heart failure@@@.

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ modulates microbiota and improves blood @DISEASE_Pressure_Ulcer @DISEASE_MESH:D003668 @@@pressure@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@cardiac remodeling@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

results.title: Effects of Metformin in Heart Failure: From Pathophysiological Rationale to Clinical Evidence
results.text_hl: In these experimental models, @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_5563 @@@AMPK@@@ activation by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ repressed @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@cardiac remodeling@@@ and rescued cardiac function.

results.title: Metformin Attenuates Hyperglycaemia-Stimulated Pro-Fibrotic Gene Expression in Adventitial Fibroblasts via Inhibition of Discoidin Domain Receptor 2
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is reported to reduce the long-term complications of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, including @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular fibrosis@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@remodelling@@@.

results.title: Propranolol and low-dose isoproterenol ameliorate insulin resistance, enhance beta-arrestin2 signaling, and reduce cardiac remodeling in high-fructose, high-fat diet-fed mice: Comparative study with metformin.
results.text_hl: SIGNIFICANCE: @CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@Propranolol@@@ and L-D-ISOPROT, like @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, can reduce @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin-resistance@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@cardiac remodeling@@@ in HFrHFD-fed @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, possibly by upregulating beta-arrestin2 signaling activity.

results.title: Effect of Metformin on Oxidative Stress and Left Ventricular Geometry in Nondiabetic Heart Failure Patients: A Randomized Controlled Trial.
results.text_hl: We hypothesized that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ might improve oxidative stress and @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@left ventricular remodeling@@@ in nondiabetic @DISEASE_Heart_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D006333 @@@HF@@@ patients with reduced ejection fraction (HFrEF).

results.title: Effects of antidiabetic drugs on left ventricular function/dysfunction: a systematic review and network meta-analysis
results.text_hl: The mitigation of @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@left ventricular (LV) remodeling@@@ was paralleled by improvements in LV systolic performance.

results.title: Immune mitochondrial complex I mediates vascular damage in toll-like receptor 7 (TLR7)-induced lupus.
results.text_hl: Pharmacological dual inhibition of glycolysis with @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2-deoxy-D-glucose@@@ and mitochondrial metabolism with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ further supports the therapeutic potential of metabolic targeting, improving vascular function and preventing @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@aortic remodeling@@@, characterized by proteoglycan and collagen accumulation, increased aortic stiffness, and secretory and profibrotic phenotypes.
